EmailTemplate.name: 18-0323 FlexRate Launch
EmailTemplate.subject: New FlexRate Loan Offering!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Something new from BlueWave to help your sales....
BlueWave will now be providing a FlexRate Loan to improve your customer conversion rates. The FlexRate Loan features lower rates for the first 5 years provide a faster path to ownership at a lower total cost for customers.
Additional Customer Benefits provided by BlueWave Financing:
Interest-Only Payments for 18 months: Upfront savings with interest-only payments following the installation period. No Money Down: Customers make no payments until after system installation. No Penalties for Early Repayment: Ability to pay off loans early for additional savings. Online, Automated Bill-Pay: We make signing up and managing loans seamless & secure. Personal Support: Best in class service from BlueWave Customer Care.
Are you interested in providing FlexRate Loans? Please contact your BlueWave Partner to learn about eligibility.
Thank you for working with BlueWave to revolutionize energy access!
- All of us here at BlueWave
